MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the PA14 postcode area of Port Glasgow, affecting properties in Marloch Avenue and surrounding areas. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of onsite difficulties and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:34PM on Sunday 25 October 2020.
